Bookmark

No bookmarks yet, find word and bookmark it

How this works

Search for any word, explore its meaning, pronunciation, synonyms, and examples, and build your vocabulary effortlessly. also there is section for grammar quiz to test u grammar knowledge

Overview

this App is a modern and user-friendly dictionary application designed to provide fast and accurate word definitions and example sentences. Whether you're a student, writer, or language enthusiast, this app helps you expand your vocabulary effortlessly.

inspiration

This app came to life after one month of research and it was inspired by Dictionary app Gaints in the market like mariam webster Google dictionary and Dictionary.com

How do I use

Enter a word in the search bar and press enter. The app fetches the definition, pronunciation, and examples from a reliable dictionary API.

Grammer Quiz

Which of the following is not in the middle voice?

b) “The man saw himself in the mirror.

c) “Joanna entertained herself by whistling.”.

d) “The employees dedicated themselves to their work.”
